newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Samsung Display to produce touch panel.
newsitem.headline: Samsung Display to produce touch panel.

text.p: Samsung Display Devices Co, a unit of South Korea's Samsung Group , said on Wednesday it would produce the country's first "touch panel" from August.

Touch panels, widely used in personal digital assistants and notebooks, are memory devices that allow operation through the use of a finger or a plastic pen instead of the traditional keyboard or mouse.

Samsung Display had invested three billion won in development. It said it would have a monthly production capacity of 30,000 units for 300mm X 370mm sized panels and 60,000 units for 370mm X 480mm sized panels.
